websiteHeaderMenuText: Journal of thoughts, ideas and life experiences.

contents.value: Hello I am Aniket and I am a programmer. In my free time I like to try things and this website is one of my latest endeavors. I have created this website as a medium to express myself creatively, be it designing the website itself or sharing writings, pictures and other media.

Aside from work, some of my interests include science, history, languages and geography. Also, I really love spending time in nature, even though living in a metro city can make it hard to do so on a day to day basis, I keep my hopes up by doing it whenever I can! For keeping myself sane in this life that involves sitting in front of a screen for hours, I like to run (away from my problems! :D), and if possible swim too!
